class Ability[source]

Ability(damage, damage_type)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Character[source]

Character(name, health) :: ABC

Helper class that provides a standard way to create an ABC using inheritance.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Wizard[source]

Wizard(name, health, ability) :: Character

Helper class that provides a standard way to create an ABC using inheritance.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Demon[source]

Demon(name, health, ability) :: Character

Helper class that provides a standard way to create an ABC using inheritance.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
